entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
